NC.Q: Which is smaller, the value of Commercial Real Estate, Rental Market, or Short-Term Rentals?
NC.A: The value of {Short-Term Rentals} is smaller.

MSR.Q: Which hierarchical path in the sunburst chart makes the largest contribution to the total?
MSR.A: The path that contributes the most to the total is: {Commercial Real Estate to Office Buildings to Downtown Offices to Class B}.
